welcome.headline: Hello there! I'm Shivang.
welcome.text: Going above and beyond to create the best possible systems and applications that perform and get the job done

technicalExperience.description: From web services to networks to game development, having experience in a variety of technologies is important for developers in the rapidly evolving world we live in today

experience.description: Building responsive web applications with user experience in mind
Developing scalable and reliable services and APIs
Implementing relational and NoSQL databases that are performant and resilient
Designing service-oriented solutions and distributed systems
Knowlege of TCP/IP, Unity and Computer Vision and languages including Go, Rust and Python
